name: Hextera
description:
*** LudumDare 37 Entry ***

*** REQUIRES TWO PLAYERS AND TWO GAMEPADS ***

Hextera is a same screen local multiplayer battle arena, two wizards duel to the death using a variety of elements.

Elements play a major factor in Hextera, depending on the element you're or you're shooting. If two wizards are the same element, projectiles will heal you. Opposing elements do more damage. Example: Fire -> Earth does more damage than Earth -> Fire.

Controls

Using a Xbox Gamepad

Left Joystick : Movement

A : Cycle through wizard element type :(Fire, Water, Earth)

B: Shoot selected element

X: Speed boost

Y: Special attack
